title: Reasoning Skill Development Project Through the Scientific Inquiry Cycle

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic scientific terminology and experimental design principles
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment using personal smart devices, combining teacher-led formative assessment with peer evaluation.

learning_goals: Students can solve scientific problems following the OPIRR inquiry cycle (Orientation-Planning-Implementation-Reporting-Reflection).
Improve hypothesis verification skills by systematically comparing and analyzing experimental conditions.
Understand the coherence of scientific reasoning using real-world scientific paper examples.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
